TextView.android:text: The most convenient easiet and cheapest and fastest method to travel in Delh is by Delhi Metro.The metro is spread all over the city and is very helpful for the tourists to visit many historical places such as the Red Fort,Jantar Mantar,Qutub Minar.It is also helps to reach many shopping places.
Smart Cards are available for tourists.They are available for unlimited travel for short duration.
One-Day Card : available at a cost of Rs 200/- (Rs 150 + Rs 50 refundable security)
Three-Day Card: at a cost of Rs 500/- (Rs. 450 + Rs 50 refund)
